changeSet.sql: CREATE FORCE VIEW USER_PREFERENCE_GRAPH(ID, USERNAME, SCHOOL_YEAR_ID, SCHOOL_YEAR, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCHOOL_YEAR_VERSION, STUDENT_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, GRADE, STUDENT_VERSION, NOTE_ID, TIMESTAMP, TEXT, NOTE_VERSION) AS SELECT UP.ID, UP.USERNAME, SY.ID AS SCHOOL_YEAR_ID, SY.SCHOOL_YEAR, SY.START_DATE, SY.END_DATE, SY.VERSION AS SCHOOL_YEAR_VERSION, S.ID AS STUDENT_ID, S.FIRST_NAME, S.LAST_NAME, S.GRADE, S.VERSION AS STUDENT_VERSION, N.ID AS NOTE_ID, N.TIMESTAMP, N.TEXT, N.VERSION AS NOTE_VERSION FROM PUBLIC.USER_PREFERENCE UP LEFT OUTER JOIN PUBLIC.SCHOOL_YEAR SY ON UP.SCHOOL_YEAR_ID = SY.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PUBLIC.STUDENT_SCHOOL_YEAR SSY ON SY.ID = SSY.SCHOOL_YEAR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PUBLIC.STUDENT S ON SSY.STUDENT_ID = S.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PUBLIC.STUDENT_NOTE SN ON S.ID = SN.STUDENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PUBLIC.NOTE N ON (SN.NOTE_ID = N.ID) AND ((N.TIMESTAMP IS NULL) OR ((SY.START_DATE <= N.TIMESTAMP) AND (SY.END_DATE >= N.TIMESTAMP)))
